plot: Jon Allen (The Final Hit) is Jack, and he is faced with the harsh reality that his best friend, Bobby (Roger Gobin) won't be able to make their annual Vegas get-away. Jack imagines what life would be like with his new best friend.
title: Without Bobby
plot_es: Jon Allen (The Final Hit) is Jack, and he is faced with the harsh reality that his best friend, Bobby (Roger Gobin) won't be able to make their annual Vegas get-away. Jack imagines what life would be like with his new best friend.
